com.mysema.query.lucene
Class LuceneSerializer

java.lang.Object
  com.mysema.query.lucene.LuceneSerializer
Direct Known Subclasses:
SearchSerializer
public class LuceneSerializer
extends Object

Serializes Querydsl queries to Lucene queries.

Author:
vema
